name: Hotdog Delivery? | KenneyJam2019
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game, as well as my submission for the Kenney Jam 2019 game jam. 

The theme is that of a Clicker Platformer, though not fully implemented.

 The controls are simple: click/tap the move button in the bottom left corner to move forward, and hold it to jump. 

The goal is to reach the end of the level. 

Thanks for your consideration!
